title: Was Walter Blackie designing Whitles Washington, the football team in the capital, Lugo?
subtitle: The claim was circulated online in July 2020 after the National Football Team said that it was dropping its name and logo "Redskins."
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: Walter "Blucky" Whitzel, former leader of the black-foot nation, designed the motto of the Indian president of the Washington, D.C. Team "Redskins."
